EmailTemplate.name: CSD NPS Survey Contact Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Please Participate TE Connectivity Customer Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
TE Connectivity is dedicated to enhance our ability to serve you more effectively. With this in mind, we are pleased to invite you to participate in our 2014 Customer Survey. As part of our ongoing commitment to providing extraordinary customer experiences, we would like to hear your valuable opinions and candid feedback. Your feedback is a critical piece of improving our ability to serve you.
This global survey will help TE better understand your needs and concerns, allowing us to enhance our service to you.
For your convenience, the survey is available in 9 languages and should take only 5 minutes to complete. To participate, please click on the following link:
{!Contact.External_NPS_Survey_Link__c}
If needed, we may reach out to you after the survey to ensure we fully understand your response and comments.
I would greatly appreciate if you could complete the survey by Sep18. Thank you in advance for your time and participation and thank you for your business with TE Connectivity!
Sincerely
Steven Peterson VP of Sales, Consumer Devices TE Connectivity
This was sent from an unmonitored email account. Please do not reply to this message.
